Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShape

    public class Triangle
extends ShapeDroid
    The Class Triangle represents triangle shape objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Triangle

        public Triangle(float nLeft,
                float nTop,
                float nRight,
                float nBottom,
                float nX,
                float nY,
                float nRotation,
                java.awt.Color cColor,
                IStrategy iStrategy,
                ShapeSize sSize,
                int nScore,
                int nMultiplier,
                int nChildren)
        Instantiates a new triangle shape object.
        Parameters:
        nLeft - The minimum X coordinate of the new shape
        nTop - The minimum Y coordinate of the new shape
        nRight - The maximum X coordinate of the new shape
        nBottom - The maximum Y coordinate of the new shape
        nX - The speed in X direction of the new shape
        nY - The speed in Y direction of the new shape
        nRotation - The speed of rotation of the new shape
        cColor - The color of the new shape
        iStrategy - The border strategy of the new shape
        sSize - The ShapeSize of the new shape
        nScore - The base score value of the new shape
        nMultiplier - The multiplier value of the new shape
        nChildren - The number of children of the new shape
